name: name_tag
doc: An entry representing a name tag

properties.name: id
properties.doc: Holds the identifier of the tagged entity

properties.name: name
properties.doc: Holds the name of the tagged entity

properties.name: type
properties.doc: Holds the type of the taggeed entity

properties.name: offset
properties.doc: Holds the offset in the name for a tag

properties.name: length
properties.doc: Holds the length of a tag
